attributes.action: Contribution based ESA Should NOT be on a time limit For Disabled People who cannot work
attributes.additional_details: Contribution based ESA is essential for my family and I to survive, we only just keep our heads above water with my partners full time wage and my ESA.  I know that we will not be the only affected people so please sign this petition if you are affected too.  I suffer with Multiple Sclerosis and cannot work, my partner works more than 24 hours per week so we cannot claim income based ESA, there are people that need to be made to work but there are also people that cannot work and need help!
